review: Have had the Fire Stick for a couple of weeks and I am extreemely happy with it!The reason why I bought this over others like roku or Google chromecast, etc. was because I am an Amazon Prime member and I wanted to guarantee that I would have access to Amazon Prime video content.The device has all of the apps that I was interested in: Pandora, Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu, HBO Go.
